meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>presents</kanji> so if you do presents, you're giving them, making this <vocabulary>to give a present</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to gift</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: If you want to give someone a present, maybe you would think about <reading>send</reading>ing/送る (おくる) it to them?
